Name: BTD6 Script API
Author: KosmicDev
Description: BTD6 Script Api is a barebones api for loading mods into BTD6 without any .NET knowledge

Name: BTD6.Jet
Author: KosmicDev
Description: All towers and base game objects will be logged as json files for easy modification!

Name: Nostalgic Village
Author: Baydock
Description: Allows user to toggle between BTD5 and BTD6 top path village attacks

Name: Monkeys Look At Player
Author: Baydock
Description: Monkeys look at the player

Name: BTD6E Leaked
Author: KosmicDev & Baydock
Description: Leaked version of the BTD6 Expansion
Tags: UI, Overhaul, New Tower, New Bloon, New Map, Cheat, Gameplay, Utility, Other

Name: No Outlet
Author: Baydock
Description: First ever fully functional map mod.

Name: Massive Mod Collection
Author: KosmicDev
Description: Compilation of one off mods. (Used to be named Massive Mod)

Name: Bonus Bloon
Author: Baydock
Description: Adds a bonus bloon that has the chance to appear at the beginning of each round.

Name: Damage Costs Monkey
Author: Lil Spiderman
Description: This mod makes the game solely reliant on how much cash you have. Simply put, bloons leaked costs you cash instead of lives, and if you get to 0 cash then it's game over!

Name: Money Stuff
Author: Lil Spiderman
Description: Cheat mod that will continuously give you cash until the game is over. (SinglePlayer Only!)

Name: All Fortifed
Author: Baydock
Description: Adds a fortified variant to every bloon. To add even more excitement, a new "All Fortified" toggle has been added to the challenge editor that makes every bloon fortified, similar to the "All Camo" and "All Regrow" toggles. Feel free to use the new toggle to make challenges for others to play, as long as they have this mod as well.

Name: Minus One Damage
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Everything does 1 fewer layers of damage (except damage-over-time effects). Example: Dart Monkeys do 0 damage, but Crossbows do 2 damage. Better make use of Alchemist Brews! Intended for challenge seekers.

Name: Send Next Round
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Tap F6 in any game mode to send the next round. Practice races all you want!

Name: Pets Follow Mouse
Author: HemiDemiSemiPresent
Description: Pets will follow your mouse. Oh and they have lazers

Name: Ace Micro
Author: HemiDemiSemiPresent
Description: Removes WingMonkey and Centered Path targetting from Monkey Ace because they suck.

Name: Single Player Coop
Author: Baydock
Description: Allows coop with only one player for that coop medal grind. Also allows public coop for any map and difficulty.

Name: Dumb Buffs
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Press I in any game mode to send the next round. Practice races all you want!

Name: Extra Child
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Most bloons produce +1 child. (Example: Popped BFBs spawn 5 MOABs that each spawn 5 Ceramics). Had to restrict it to only Zebras and higher otherwise the game becomes super laggy due to the exponential Bloon population growth.

Name: Bricko Mode
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Admiral Brickell costs twice as much and levels slower, but received major buffs. Sea Mines are deployed 5% faster per level. Level 7 makes her pistol have global range. Level 8 lets her summon temporary Fighter Aces. Level 13 Mega Mines leave Oil Fires on the track upon detonation, which do more damage at level 18 and 20. At level 14, Naval Tactics grants +2 pierce and +1 layer pop to affected towers. Level 16 replaces her pistol with a Laser Machine Gun which has a DoT and AoE. Level 19 improves Naval Tactics further to give a 3x attack speed boost rather than 2x.

Name: All Buckshot
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Most towers in the game fire 400% slower, but with 400% more projectiles in a large spread, including farms and towers that already fire multiple projectiles. Does not affect most sub-towers such as Sentries or Aces nor attacks from abilities like Rocket Storm. Towers with fixed targets such as Sniper, Alchemists, 4+xx Dartling, and Mortars will fire 5 shots at a time at the same target/location.

Name: Tower Projectile Swap
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Swaps the appearance of most towers with their projectiles.

Name: Manual Bomb Blitz
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Bomb Blitz's Bomb Storm ability can also be activated manually.

Name: DoorGunner Deluxe
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Doorgunner Monkey Knowledge allows Special Poperations to carry up to 15 towers with no limitations. You can put in tier 5s, Heroes, Farms, Villages (they buff other towers in the Heli), True Sun God, and even itself.

Name: IKEA Monkeys
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Towers appear as Engineers and deploy copies of the original.
